Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. With its unique features and high-quality materials, this product is truly a standout in its category. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection or serve your specific needs perfectly. I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $150. This is a special opportunity to own something truly remarkable at a price that reflects its quality and craftsmanship. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
